value:
$WmMPID_ライ,ch11_10_Lay_M_Normal,Face|I'm happy you're excited, Lethe,
but this is basically just training,
all right? No need to get wild.$k$p$WmMPID_レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_Normal,Face|I get it—and this IS calm for me.
But this is a matter of honor for the
beast tribe, so I'll bare my claws!$k$p$WmMPID_モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_Normal,Face|Yes! I, too, will do my best. Against
fellow members of the beast tribe,
we need not hold back.$k$p
